topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542507516368725158600000#post_542507516368725158600000
1950s people were actually better problem solvers than people of the present. Sure, their medicine and scientific understandings weren't as developed as now. But they were better with math on average according to statistics. And they did much of it without the use of electronic calculators that we take for granted today.
